meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a prism.
meanings.sent1: The sunlight created a prismy effect on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The crystal was so prismy, reflecting all the colors of the rainbow.
meanings.sent3: The cat's eyes looked prismy in the sunlight, making it seem magical.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a prismy burst of joy, spreading happiness all around.
meanings.sent5: The dew on the grass looked prismy, like tiny diamonds scattered on the ground.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of a prism.
meanings.sent1: The glass sculpture had a prismy appearance, refracting light beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The water droplets on the window created a prismy effect when the sun shone through.
meanings.sent3: The disco ball cast a prismy glow on the dance floor, adding to the party atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as prismy as a kaleidoscope, always changing and full of surprises.
meanings.sent5: The soap bubbles floated in the air, looking prismy and iridescent in the sunlight.
